thread.section_title: Sanctuary Hotel New York - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great for couples
thread.title_full: Great for couples - Review of Sanctuary Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jannelle H
title: Great for couples
text: This hotel was prefect for my husband and I. Everyone (staff) was super friendly, we thought the location was great and were able to walk to everything we wanted to see and do! The room was clean but it was small we loved it though and thought it was romantic probably not a hotel I would bring my children to. Parking was only $45 for 24 hours which we thought wasn't bad compared to a couple of the other hotels we looked into. Had a great time and would definitely recommend
